text: yeoseongdeul-eun neohuideul-i gakkueo ya hal gyeongjagjiwa gatnani neohoega wonhalttae gyeongjagjilo gakkai gala geuli hayeo ssileul ppulidoe neohoe seuseuloleul wihae josimseuleowoya hago hananim-eulgong-gyeonghal geos-imyeo eonjenga geubun-eul yeong jeobhage doelilaneun geos-eul algo mid-eum eul gajinjadeul-ege bog-eum-eul jeonhala
